query:
UPDATE
                tee_verifier_input_producer_jobs
            SET
                status = $1,
                attempts = attempts + 1,
                updated_at = NOW(),
                processing_started_at = NOW()
            WHERE
                l1_batch_number = (
                    SELECT
                        l1_batch_number
                    FROM
                        tee_verifier_input_producer_jobs
                    WHERE
                        status = $2
                        OR (
                            status = $1
                            AND processing_started_at < NOW() - $4 :: INTERVAL
                        )
                        OR (
                            status = $3
                            AND attempts < $5
                        )
                    ORDER BY
                        l1_batch_number ASC
                    LIMIT
                        1 FOR
                    UPDATE
                        SKIP LOCKED
                )
            RETURNING
                tee_verifier_input_producer_jobs.l1_batch_number
